oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Steamboat and Dormitory Barge, Camp Cole Foster, Dyer, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Medley, Warren
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For current rights information, please visit: http://idserver.utk.edu/?id=200600000001200
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This small photograph shows a steamboat and dormitory barge of Camp Cole Foster, Dyer, Tennessee. The steamboat has U.S.E.D on the side. The barge has the corps of engineers insignia on the side.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Civilian Conservation Corps .S.) -- FACILITIES -- 1930-1950
Tennessee Valley Authority and "grass roots democracy" .

oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: The Great Depression and World War II (1929-1945).
